T5EK.Exhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws

T5EK.Actions.OverriddenSetOverrideFalse: Remove from Actions List (Shift+Click to clear override)
T5EK.Actions.OverriddenSetOverrideTrue: Add to Actions List (Shift+Click to clear override)

T5EK.SheetEdit.Description: Toggle visibility of add/delete buttons and empty sections
T5EK.SheetLock.Description: Toggle lock for sensitive fields that should not change often
T5EK.EmptySection: This section is empty. Unlock the sheet to edit.
T5EK.GMOnlyEdit: Only your GM can edit this section.
T5EK.AttunementWarning: Attunement: Unable to attune to more than {number} items.
T5EK.SearchHint: Start typing to show search results
T5EK.ItemCardsKeyHint: hold key to interact with card
T5EK.PreparedSpellsMax: Maximum for prepared spells (Note: do not use 'Override' mode on the active effect')

T5EK.TabSelection.Title: Tab Selection: {documentName}
T5EK.TabSelection.UnsupportedDocumentErrorMessage: The document type {documentType} is not currently set up for tab selection.
T5EK.TabSelection.AtLeastOneRequiredErrorMessage: At least one tab is required.
T5EK.TabSelection.Explanation: Any tabs that the user or sheet are configured not to see (e.g., disabling the journal in config settings) will still not appear on the sheet, even if selected.

T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.name: Tidy Sheet Settings
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.hint: Customize your own version of Tidy 5e Sheets
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.label: Sheet Settings
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.title: T5EK Sheet Settings

T5EK.Settings.TabLocks.hint: Prevent players from making changes to aspects of their character sheets that should change infrequently. Optionally hide some elements that you don't want to use at all.
T5EK.Settings.TabLocks.hint2: Important: sheet lock features are intended to guide player sheet use and to help prevent mistakes such as accidentally adding/removing a saving throw proficiency. Sheet lock settings do not provide a secure lockdown against players with malicious intent.

T5EK.Settings.TabInfo.GithubParagraph: Do you have a feature idea? Is something wrong? Submit a {urlStart}Github Issue{urlEnd}.
T5EK.Settings.TabInfo.DiscordParagraph: {urlStart}Tidy 5e Sheets Discord Server{urlEnd}: Discuss new feature ideas, get help from others, and track progress of this module.
T5EK.Settings.TabInfo.LocalizationParagraph: {urlStart}Foundry Hub Weblate{urlEnd}: Do you localize web content? Tidy 5e Sheets could use your help! Go to the Weblate website to see our localization progress in various languages. This module is accepting new language translations and modifications to existing translations.
T5EK.Settings.TabInfo.FinancialSupportParagraph: If you like Tidy 5e Sheets and want to support it financially, here are some ways to do it:

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.name: Show Item Cards in All Layouts
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.hint: When this setting is disabled, item cards only show in the grid.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForNPCs.name: Show Item Cards for NPCs/Vehicles
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForNPCs.hint: Enable to show item info cards for NPCs and vehicles.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.name: Show Floating Item Cards
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.hint: Enable to have item info cards float next to the mouse cursor. Recommended: use delay with this feature.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.name: Item Card Delay (ms)
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.hint: Delays showing item cards for the specified milliseconds (ms). 0 means no delay. Default: 300.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.name: Item Card Fix Key
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.hint: Hold this keyboard character (for example, the "x" key) while viewing an item card to keep it visible and allow for interaction.

T5EK.Settings.DefaultTheme.name: Default Color Theme
T5EK.Settings.DefaultTheme.hint: The default theme for all users who do not have a specific theme selected.

T5EK.Settings.UseClassicControls.name: Use Classic List Controls
T5EK.Settings.UseClassicControls.hint: Shows controls in the list view.

T5EK.Settings.ShowIconsNextToTheItemName.name: Show Item Name Icons
T5EK.Settings.ShowIconsNextToTheItemName.hint: Shows support icons next to the item name (Favorite, Attunement, etc.).

T5EK.Settings.ShowTraitLabels.name: Show Trait Labels
T5EK.Settings.ShowTraitLabels.hint: Shows labels for PC, NPC, and Vehicle traits. Disable to show only icons.

T5EK.Settings.ShowPlayerName.name: Show Player Name
T5EK.Settings.ShowPlayerName.hint: Shows a field for the player name below the character's name.

T5EK.Settings.ShowClassList.name: Show Class List
T5EK.Settings.ShowClassList.hint: Shows the class list below the character's name.

T5EK.Settings.HideIfZero.name: Hide Exhaustion and Inspiration Tracker on 0
T5EK.Settings.HideIfZero.hint: Hides exhaustion and inspiration if 0 but still shows on hover.

T5EK.Settings.ShowInspirationOnHover.name: Show Inspiration Indicator Only on Hover
T5EK.Settings.ShowInspirationOnHover.hint: Shows the inspiration indicator only when hovering over the portrait.

T5EK.Settings.ShowExhaustionOnHover.name: Show Exhaustion Tracker Only on Hover
T5EK.Settings.ShowExhaustionOnHover.hint: Shows the exhaustion tracker only when hovering over the portrait.

T5EK.Settings.UseHpBar.name: Use HP Bar
T5EK.Settings.UseHpBar.hint: Shows a colored bar indicating remaining HP. Health numbers will still be visible.

T5EK.Settings.ToggleEmptyCharacterTraits.name: Toggle Empty Character Traits
T5EK.Settings.ToggleEmptyCharacterTraits.hint: Adds a toggle button for showing/hiding empty traits.

T5EK.Settings.ShowEquippedAmmoOnly.name: Show Equipped Ammunition Only
T5EK.Settings.ShowEquippedAmmoOnly.hint: Shows only currently equipped ammunition in the weapon ammo selector.

T5EK.Settings.AlwaysShowTraits.name: Always Show Traits
T5EK.Settings.AlwaysShowTraits.hint: Removes the visibility toggle button for empty traits and shows all.

T5EK.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.name: Always Show Skills
T5EK.Settings.AlwaysShowSkills.hint: Removes the visibility toggle button for non-proficient skills and shows all.

T5EK.Settings.ShowNPCSpellbookTab.name: Show Spellbook Tab
T5EK.Settings.ShowNPCSpellbookTab.hint: Shows a spellbook tab for NPCs. Disable to move the spellbook section to the Attributes tab.

T5EK.Settings.ShowActiveEffectsMarker.name: Show Active Effects Marker
T5EK.Settings.ShowActiveEffectsMarker.hint: Shows a marker for list view items that have active effects.

T5EK.Settings.UseContextMenu.name: Use Context Menu
T5EK.Settings.UseContextMenu.hint: Enables right-click context menu on items.

T5EK.Settings.ShowExpandedLimitedView.name: Show Expanded Limited View
T5EK.Settings.ShowExpandedLimitedView.hint: Displays the entire sheet (minus the journal) to players with limited permission.

T5EK.Settings.UseTotalSheetLock.name: Lock Down Sensitive Fields
T5EK.Settings.UseTotalSheetLock.hint: Locks infrequently changed fields (name, proficiency toggles) and hides configuration buttons when the sheet is locked.

T5EK.Settings.LimitEffectsManagementToGM.name: Limit Active Effects Management to GMs
T5EK.Settings.LimitEffectsManagementToGM.hint: Limits permission to edit or toggle active effects to GMs only.

T5EK.Settings.AlwaysShowItemQuantity.name: Always Show Item Quantity
T5EK.Settings.AlwaysShowItemQuantity.hint: Shows item quantity on list views even when not hovered.

T5EK.Settings.UseInspiration.name: Use Inspiration Tracker
T5EK.Settings.UseInspiration.hint: Shows an inspiration tracker on the character profile.

T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleMotion.name: Use Vehicle Motion Tracker
T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleMotion.hint: Shows a motion tracker on the vehicle profile.

T5EK.Settings.UseExhaustion.name: Use Exhaustion Tracker
T5EK.Settings.UseExhaustion.hint: Shows an exhaustion tracker for characters, NPCs, and vehicles.

T5EK.Settings.UseNPCRest.name: Use NPC Rest
T5EK.Settings.UseNPCRest.hint: Allows NPCs to take short and long rests.

T5EK.Settings.ShowNPCRestInChat.name: Show NPC Rest in Chat
T5EK.Settings.ShowNPCRestInChat.hint: Shows a chat card when an NPC rests.

T5EK.Settings.ShowNPCActorLinkMarker.name: Mark Linked/Unlinked NPCs
T5EK.Settings.ShowNPCActorLinkMarker.hint: Adds a colored border and icon to linked/unliked NPC sheets.

T5EK.Settings.InitialSheetTab.name: Initial Sheet Tab
T5EK.Settings.InitialSheetTab.hint: Shows the indicated tab when opening a sheet for the first time.

T5EK.Settings.DefaultSheetTabs.name: Default Sheet Tabs
T5EK.Settings.DefaultSheetTabs.hint: Determines which tabs will show and in what order by default. Applies when no tab selections have been made for an actor.
T5EK.Settings.DefaultSheetTabs.AtLeastOneTabRequiredErrorMessage: Default tabs: at least one tab is required for each actor type.

T5EK.Settings.HideDeathSavesFromPlayers.name: Hide Death Saves From Players
T5EK.Settings.HideDeathSavesFromPlayers.hint: Makes death saves and death save results visible only to the GM.

T5EK.Settings.UseSpellSlotMarker.name: Use Spell Slot Marker
T5EK.Settings.UseSpellSlotMarker.hint: Shows spell slot markers (dots) above leveled spell sections in the spellbook.

T5EK.Settings.UseCharacterEncumbranceBar.name: Use Character Encumbrance Bar
T5EK.Settings.UseCharacterEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on character sheets.

T5EK.Settings.UseNPCEncumbranceBar.name: Use NPC Encumbrance Bar
T5EK.Settings.UseNPCEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on NPC sheets.

T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleEncumbranceBar.name: Use Vehicle Encumbrance Bar
T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on vehicle sheets.

T5EK.Settings.NPCSheetWidth.name: Default NPC Sheet Width
T5EK.Settings.NPCSheetWidth.hint: The width of the NPC sheet in pixels when showing the sheet for the first time. Requires a refresh to take effect. Default: 740.

T5EK.Settings.PlayerSheetWidth.name: Default Player Sheet Width
T5EK.Settings.PlayerSheetWidth.hint: The width of the player character sheet in pixels when showing the sheet for the first time. Requires a refresh to take effect. Default: 740.

T5EK.Settings.VehicleSheetWidth.name: Default Vehicle Sheet Width
T5EK.Settings.VehicleSheetWidth.hint: The width of the vehicle sheet in pixels when showing the sheet for the first time. Requires a refresh to take effect. Default: 740.

T5EK.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFilt.name: Use Multiclass Spellbook Filter
T5EK.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFilt.hint: Allows filtering spells by class in the spellbook tab. The spell must be associated with a class using the Class selector on the spell edit sheet.

T5EK.Settings.UseSpellClassIcons.name: Use Spell Class Icon for Spells
T5EK.Settings.UseSpellClassIcons.hint: Shows spell class's image on spells instead of the spell's own image. The spell must be associated with a class using the Class selector on the spell edit sheet. When multiclassing, this feature distinguishes which spells belong to which class at a glance.

T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterAdditional.name: Additional Classes for Multiclass Spellbook Filtering
T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterAdditional.hint: Puts additional classes in the multiclass spellbook filter. Add classes to the dropdown with this syntax "id1|name1,id2|name2" e.g. "occultist|Occultist,alchemist|Alchemist"

T5EK.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepared.name: Allow Cantrips to be Prepared
T5EK.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepared.hint: The "cantrip formulas" optional rule from Tasha's Cauldron of Everything allows wizards to prepare cantrips after a long rest in the same way that they do with leveled spells. Prepared cantrips do not count toward total prepared spells.

T5EK.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.name: Lock Currency
T5EK.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to currency.

T5EK.Settings.LockExpChanges.name: Lock Experience
T5EK.Settings.LockExpChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to experience.

T5EK.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.name: Lock Max HP Changes
T5EK.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to max HP.

T5EK.Settings.LockLevelSelector.name: Lock Level Selector
T5EK.Settings.LockLevelSelector.hint: Prevents non-GMs from changing player levels with the class level selector.

T5EK.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.name: Lock Sheet Selection
T5EK.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.hint: Prevents non-GMs from selecting another sheet layout.

T5EK.Settings.LockItemQuantity.name: Lock Item Quantity
T5EK.Settings.LockItemQuantity.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to item quantity.

T5EK.Settings.ActionsListLimitActionsToC.name: Limit Actions to Cantrips
T5EK.Settings.ActionsListLimitActionsToC.hint: Instead of showing all spells that deal damage in the Actions tab/panel by default, limits to only cantrips. This is the default D&DBeyond behavior.

T5EK.Settings.ActionsListIncludeMinuteLo.name: Include Minute-long Spells as Actions
T5EK.Settings.ActionsListIncludeMinuteLo.hint: Includes spells with a duration of one minute or less (e.g. 1 round) and an activation time of 1 Action or 1 Bonus Action (e.g. Bless, Bane, Command) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

T5EK.Settings.ActionsListIncludeSpellsWi.name: Include Spells with Active Effects as Actions
T5EK.Settings.ActionsListIncludeSpellsWi.hint: Includes spells with active effects attached (e.g. Barkskin) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

T5EK.Settings.ActionsListIncludeConsumab.name: Include Consumables as Actions
T5EK.Settings.ActionsListIncludeConsumab.hint: Includes consumables which have an activation cost (Action, Bonus Action, etc) in the Actions list by default.

T5EK.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.name: Allow HP Max Override on Character
T5EK.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.hint: Allows the GM to manually change max HP on the character sheet.

T5EK.Settings.Reset.name: Reset Settings to Default
T5EK.Settings.Reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default. This affects "world"-scoped settings only, such as GM options.

dialogs.title: Reset Module Settings
dialogs.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? This cannot be undone.

T5EK.Settings.Debug.name: Enable Debugging
T5EK.Settings.Debug.hint: Prints debug messages to the console.

T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockCharacter.name: Character Sheet: Always Unlocked for GM
T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockCharacter.hint: Treat the character sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the character, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the character.
T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockCharacter.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockNPCSheetF.name: NPC Sheet: Always Unlocked for GM
T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockNPCSheetF.hint: Treat the NPC sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the NPC, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the NPC.
T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockNPCSheetF.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockVehicleSh.name: Vehicle Sheet: Always Unlocked for GM
T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockVehicleSh.hint: Treat the vehicle sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the vehicle, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the vehicle.
T5EK.Settings.PermanentlyUnlockVehicleSh.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

SheetMenu.name: Tidy Theme Settings
SheetMenu.hint: Customize the colors of Tidy 5e Sheets.

Sheet.title: Theme Settings
Sheet.importDropHint: Hint: You can drag a ".tidy5e-theme" file onto this form to import it.
Sheet.importError: Theme import failed. See console for more details.
Sheet.explanation: Select what color you wish to use for each option. The value "#00000000" is equivalent to disabling the color.

T5EK.VehicleExhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws
T5EK.VehicleExhaustion6: Hit points drop to 0 and the vehicle breaks down
